text: Joseph "the Builder" Andriacchi (October 20, 1932 - August 2024) was an American mobster. He was reported by Chicago newspapers to be a high-ranking member of the Chicago Outfit criminal organization. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Andriacchi was identified in a 1995 Chicago Tribune article as being an underboss for day-to-day operations for the Chicago Outfit. On September 30, 2007, the Chicago Tribune reported that law enforcement sources indicated that Andriacchi controls Chicago's north side and north suburbs, and that he leads the Elmwood Park crew. Andriacchi was a cousin by marriage to Joey "The Clown" Lombardo.William Roemer, Accardo: The Genuine Godfather (New York: Ivey Books, 1995), 393 Andriacchi and his late wife, Silvana Venditti-Andriacchi, lived in River Forest, Illinois. Andriacchi died in August 2024, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Joseph Andriacchi Archive at TheChicagoSyndicate.com Category:1932 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Chicago Outfit mobsters Category:Criminals from Chicago
